title: The Fiend
content: through small openings. It is very hard to damage. Until Long RestMelee Concentration Grant Flight Lvl 3 Transmutation ActionLevel 3 Warlock Spell Slot Bestow the ability to Fly upon yourself or an ally. 10 Turns Melee Concentration Hunger of Hadar Lvl 3 Conjuration ActionLevel 3 Warlock Spell Slot 4~24 Damage 2d6 Cold +2d6 Acid (Conditional) Creatures within this black sphere are Blinded and take damage at the end of their turn and the start of their turn.10Turns 18m 6m DEX Save Concentration
